test.name: experiment saveBatch of runs with material inputs and outputs
test.url: library(Rlabkey) m1 <- labkey.experiment.createMaterial(list(name = "87444063.2604.626")) m2 <- labkey.experiment.createMaterial(list(name = "87444063.2604.625")) run <- labkey.experiment.createRun(list(name = "new run with materials"), materialInputs = m1, materialOutputs = m2) labkey.experiment.saveBatch(protocolName=labkey.experiment.SAMPLE_DERIVATION_PROTOCOL, runList=run, baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%")

test.name: experiment saveBatch of runs with data inputs and outputs
test.url: library(Rlabkey) d1 <- labkey.experiment.createData(list(pipelinePath = "data.tsv")) d2 <- labkey.experiment.createData(list(pipelinePath = "result.txt")) run <- labkey.experiment.createRun(list(name = "new run with datas"), dataInputs = d1, dataOutputs = d2) labkey.experiment.saveBatch(protocolName=labkey.experiment.SAMPLE_DERIVATION_PROTOCOL, runList=run, baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%")
